messages.confirmEndGame: Are you sure you want to end this game?
messages.confirmRemoveAllTeams: Are you sure you want to remove all teams in this game?
messages.confirmRemoveGame: Are you sure you want to kill this game?
messages.confirmRemoveScore: Are you sure you want to remove this score?
messages.confirmRemoveTeam: Are you sure you want to remove "{{ teamName }}" in this game?
messages.startQuickGame: Are you ready to the rumble?

errors.digitsOnly: Are you sure to have written only numbers?
errors.requiredTeamName: Did you forget to write the Team Name?
errors.requiredGameName: Did you forget to write the Game Name?
errors.teamAlreadyFound: That team was already in the game, wasn't it?

text.addNewTeam: Type the name of the team or the member you want to add to the game below, then click on the "Add" button.
text.gameNotFound: Oops, wrong link. Go back to search for a saved game
text.noGames: There are no games to display, maybe start by creating one
text.noTeams: There are no teams to display
text.selectGame: Did you leave a game already started?, Click on the name of the game.  Or if you want to start a brand new game then click on the "Create Game" button below
text.selectNewGame: To start a new game, click the "Create Game" button below
text.startNewGame: To start a new game, you need to name it, so, pick a nice one and click on "Start Game", if you change your mind, you can always hit "Cancel" instead
